answer:
ImmunizeBC needs more information for the term: measles paradox. This term is used differently in research and literature with both measles disease and measles-containing vaccines. Please email contact@bccdc.ca with more information so ImmunizeBC can better answer your question.
Immunization Nurse
question: I was directed here by the bccdc Facebook page. I was looking for new information regarding the measles paradox. I have concerns now that so many new cases are being diagnosed.
